code: import React,{useState}from"react";import'./learnLevel1.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function LearnL1(){const[selectedImage,setSelectedImage]=useState("letters/A.jpg");const[selectedLetter,setSelectedLetter]=useState("A");const sampleVideos=Array.from({length:26},(_,i)=>{const letter=String.fromCharCode(65+i);return{title:"LETTER '".concat(letter,"'"),image:"/Level1/".concat(letter,".jpg"),letter:letter};});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"learning-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"left-panel",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"preview-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"LEVEL 1 - Learning"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Letter: ",selectedLetter]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:selectedImage,alt:"Letter ".concat(selectedLetter)})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"right-panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Choose a Letter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid-wrapper",children:sampleVideos.map((video,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"letter-card",onClick:()=>{setSelectedImage(video.image);setSelectedLetter(video.letter);},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"letter-title",children:video.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"letter-footer",children:video.letter})]},index))})]})]});}export default LearnL1;
